!-- Bible Quiz-->
Start quiz Continue View scores Rate app Help Choose level Options About app About developer
Bible quiz pro is a bible quiz app for everyone, it is intended to test your knowledge of the bible.
I'm Mqondisi Ndlovu. 
A web/mobile app developer. I live in the city of Bulawayo Zimbabwe. 
You can contact me for your mobile app or web development project: 
Phone: 
+263717468729 
Email: 
mqoeyyy@gmail.com 
Website:
How to play! On the start menu click on start quiz button. 
Choose the level you wish to play.
For each levels, questions will be provided on the screen along with four button.

Each button contain one correct answer and three remaining wrong answer.
Click on the button that you think has the correct answer to the question, and the computer will tell you if it's true or false. 

You need to get at least 10 correct answers, to unlock the next level. 
And don't forget to rate the app :)
